prompt:

[R11] 2021-12-31 | 5.0★ | HISTORICAL | Excellent oysters and Po-Boys.  Yes was a wait, but service was excellent and drinks served up cold and delicious....
[R12] 2022-01-02 | 1.0★ | HISTORICAL | After looking at the hours online we went to the restaurant at 7:00 pm on New Years Day. The line was shorter than expected which should have been the first red flag. 

When we were up next to be seat...
[R13] 2022-01-03 | 5.0★ | HISTORICAL | Amazing oysters love the garlic buttery preparation. This is unique of New Orleans you have to try it....
[R14] 2022-01-06 | 4.0★ | RECENT | Missed this place on the last trip to NOLA, so had to make sure we made it this time.   Glad we did.   Short wait outside to sit at the bar and it was worth it.  We had raw oysters, oyster shooter, an...
[R15] 2022-01-08 | 5.0★ | RECENT | Sit at the bar if you can...the servers and bartenders are fun and friendly. Oysters Rockefeller are the best!...
[R16] 2022-01-10 | 5.0★ | RECENT | Char-Boyed oysters are the best thing. You should sit at the bar. You'll get seated right away. Customer service is good. No complaints.....
[R17] 2022-01-11 | 5.0★ | RECENT | The chargrilled oysters are reason enough to wait in line to dine here. This particular evening I wanted something different. I found the deep fried crab specifically delicious, very well done, tasty....
[R18] 2022-01-11 | 5.0★ | RECENT | Fast service.  Classic oyster house.  Shrimp was very fresh and delicious.   Some people say is a  tourist tramp, but they are great at what they do....
[R19] 2022-01-16 | 5.0★ | RECENT | This place does have a wait and there will be a line but it seems to move quickly. We were seated at the bar with Gary who was knowledgeable, quick and friendly. We started out with the boom boom shri...
[R20] 2022-01-17 | 3.0★ | RECENT | Came here because my friend had researched and heard amazing things about this place--we're visiting from Los Angeles. 

We ordered:

Charbroiled oysters - I found the butter and parm-tasting cheese t...

## TASK: Compare RECENT reviews (last 1/3, R14-R20) vs HISTORICAL reviews (first 2/3, R1-R13)

Compute the following metrics:

1. **N_TOTAL**: Total number of reviews
2. **N_RECENT**: Number of recent reviews (last 1/3)
3. **N_HISTORICAL**: Number of historical reviews (first 2/3)
4. **AVG_RECENT**: Average star rating of recent reviews (2 decimal places)
5. **AVG_HISTORICAL**: Average star rating of historical reviews (2 decimal places)
6. **DELTA**: AVG_RECENT - AVG_HISTORICAL (2 decimal places)
7. **DIRECTION**: If DELTA > 0.3: "IMPROVING", if DELTA < -0.3: "DECLINING", else "STABLE"
8. **RECENT_5STAR_RATIO**: Fraction of recent reviews that are 5-star (3 decimal places)
9. **HISTORICAL_5STAR_RATIO**: Fraction of historical reviews that are 5-star (3 decimal places)
10. **RECENT_1STAR_RATIO**: Fraction of recent reviews that are 1-star (3 decimal places)
11. **HISTORICAL_1STAR_RATIO**: Fraction of historical reviews that are 1-star (3 decimal places)

## OUTPUT FORMAT

Show your calculations, then output:

===FINAL ANSWERS===
N_TOTAL: [integer]
N_RECENT: [integer]
N_HISTORICAL: [integer]
AVG_RECENT: [decimal]
AVG_HISTORICAL: [decimal]
DELTA: [decimal]
DIRECTION: [IMPROVING/DECLINING/STABLE]
RECENT_5STAR_RATIO: [decimal]
HISTORICAL_5STAR_RATIO: [decimal]
RECENT_1STAR_RATIO: [decimal]
HISTORICAL_1STAR_RATIO: [decimal]
===END===
